name: Knockdown Demo
description:
Knockdown is a game under development (80% completed) that is coming this summer on Windows. It's a fast-paced king of the hill game where you control a ball that knocks other balls down the area in order to win.

As you advance in Arcade mode you will unlock new levels with a new scenery and a ton of different balls to choose from.

You will encounter a lot of power-ups and portals that will help you in your adventure but also a lot of enemies and bosses each with its unique mechanic.

The rest of the Single Player experience contains:

-Gauntlet mode where you need to defeat all the enemies as fast as possible with the help of the red gauntlet,

-Survival mode when your Strength is going down and you need to knock down other opponents in order to survive,

We also prepared a lot of Multiplayer modes to choose from:

-The traditional Versus mode where you have access to all the power-ups including the Reverso card that will reverse opponents controls,

-Arena mode where you team up with your buddies to defeat everyone who stands in your way,

-Dodgeball mode where you punch another small ball towards your opponent in order to knock them down,

-Control Mode where the second player is a god-like boss that can spawn enemies and take power-ups in order to grow bigger and come for a final showdown at the end,

-Colosseum mode is still work in progress but here each player will get bigger as the time advances and have access to two new power-ups; the steak that increases your growing process and overall strength; and the blast sphere that you can use to knock your opponent; also each time one player will hit the other they will enter into the tap mechanic; here which one presses faster wins and will knock the opponent away with his power.

The game have been tested and works with Dual Shock 4 Controller.
